title: In situ polymerization of EDOT onto sulfonated onion-like carbon for efficient pseudocapacitor electrodes
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, 3,1422-1430
DOI: 10.1039/D4YA00048J, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Christian Bauer, Maximilian Kirchner, Anke Krueger
A facile and scalable approach to combine the mechanical and capacitive advantages of onion-like carbon (OLC) with the pseudocapacitance of PEDOT in a templated architecture without dead volume and binder was developed.
